episodes.title: The Victims of Benny Hinn: 30 Years of Spiritual Deception.
episodes.description:
This video is dedicated to the victims of Benny Hinn.

Benny Hinn is a very bad man. It's past time everyone knew it. 

Timestamps:
0:00:00 Intro
1. 0:07:31 Benny's Old Lies
2. 0:45:06 Benny's Many False Prophecies
3. 1:30:45 Benny's Fake Healings
4. 2:30:10 Benny and Chris the "Man of God"
5. 2:35:11 Benny Raising the Dead
6. 2:46:51 How He "Slays in the Spirit"
7. 3:04:10 Benny's Recent Repentance
8. 3:19:54 Proof Benny Is Still Grifting
9. 3:54:27 Benny's Resurgence and Current Influence
10. 4:09:59 How Do We Stop Him?

My notes have tons of links which you may find useful. I can't promise that Benny Hinn won't delete many of the videos I used once this goes public. MY NOTES: https://biblethinker.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Hinn.docx

Todd White and his fake miracles (leg lengthening trick) https://www.youtube.com/live/je20XTohCNo?si=egd0HyDA17eCjDTM

Bill Johnson and Bethel Church's bridge to the New Age - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=weHo7pO6cmQ

I'm grateful for the people who have worked hard to expose Benny Hinn, especially Justin Peters @JustinPetersMin , Costi Hinn @forthegospelmin  and Steven Kozar @StevenKozarMessedUpChurch  

My website https://BibleThinker.org

episodes.title: How to Reach Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
This is a training for those who want to effectively reach Jehovah's Witnesses. You will learn to have a heart of compassion for the JWs when you understand what it's like to be a Jehovah's Witness and you will learn some tactics and strategies for effectively getting people out of the Watchtower. 
BELOW are the links I mentioned in the video. 

My video on JW false prophecies https://youtu.be/3nXKNAi_jnA 

Link to the site for the “Witness for Jesus Now” conference I spoke at recently http://wnfj-v2.com/ 

The Forgotten Trinity by James White (I highly recommend it) https://amzn.to/2Icox31  (affiliate)

Kingdom Interlinear Translation (published by the Watchtower) https://amzn.to/2IbDJgW  (affiliate)

If you want to support my ministry work please click here. https://biblethinker.org/index.php/donate

DISCLAIMER: This video description contains affiliate links.

episodes.title: Former JWs Share Their Story: Simon and Maria
episodes.description:
Leaving the Watchtower cost them everyone they knew and loved. But they say it was worth it! Listen to their story of discovery, trial, fear, frustration and liberation! Please consider supporting Simon and Maria as they post videos on their YouTube channel trying to help others. 

Here's Simon & Maria's YouTube channel. Let's give them some support!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWxONzmSkSwCdJsQ1nQW-qg

episodes.title: JW False Prophecies DOCUMENTED
episodes.description:
Quoting ONLY from official Watchtower sources I will demonstrate the consistent false prophecy of the JW organization.

Here is the link to the set of videos on the Bible's legitimate, fulfilled prophecy. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3t7fCLgFjuo&list=PLZ3iRMLYFlHuhA0RPKZFHVcjIMN_-F596&index=2  The audio isn't very good on the first video, if that bothers you just skip it and go to the next. 

Any Jehovah's Witness seeing this video should know that I'm not trying to attack them but to help deliver them out of a false system of religion. There is truth in Jesus but it's not found in the Watchtower, their false prophecies prove it. Please be brave enough to seek the biblical truth. I'm praying for you.

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses: beliefs practices and ERRORS
episodes.description:
A survey of JW beliefs from a Christian perspective. This teaching is a good beginning for understanding Jehovah's Witness teachings and knowing where to look to learn more.

The following link has a list of false prophecies from the Watchtower https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3nXKNAi_jnA

If you want to support my ministry work please click here. https://biblethinker.org/index.php/donate
